bibl.title: "A Heap of Stones". Aspects of the Architectural Sculpture from Heracleopolis Magna / Ahnas.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: 1. The site and the finds. - 2. Edouard Naville's excavation (1891) and its aftermath. - 3. The architectural context of the carvings. - 4. The art-historical context (end of the 4th and 5th century).
TÖRÖK László, "A Heap of Stones". Aspects of the Architectural Sculpture from Heracleopolis Magna / Ahnas.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 42 (2003) pp. 73-98 et pll. XIV-XXI.
